title: Firewall Error
body: Today i have been branded as a leaver and must play 5 games with a lower que priority, and the reason being is because i get a firewall error disallowing me from re entering a game, after i disconnect the rest of my internet is works fine, i just cant connect to the server i feel this is a problem on Riots behalf that i am being punished for, is there anyway i can get refunded for my loss' or lifted of this false title and its burdens, i have been a loyal player since season 1.

replies.body: If you've only been disconnected from one game, then you should not be punished. Leavebuster only affects people who consistently leave games.
